attributes.action: review the current meaning of life imprisonment and re-instate capital punishment for the most serious crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I, like many others feel that life sentencing is not made life, with possibilities for parole and such. Life should actually mean life and therefore must only be sentenced in the most severe of cases.

In those cases where life is not a suitable punishment I feel VERY strongly that those who deprive others of their HUMAN RIGHTS in the most extreme manner should have their HUMAN RIGHTS taken away.

This petition has been fueled by a story I have read about a father who BROKE HIS CHILDS BACK IN HALF and killed her - showing no remorse in court.

Do we REALLY think that this sort of person should be allowed to live?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
